dmca.title: [ADMINS] Notice of Copyright Infringement - Matter 205
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Carter 
Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2006 10:02 PM
To: Legal
Cc: Admins
Subject: FW: [ADMINS] Notice of Copyright Infringement - Matter 205

Forwarding to legal.

-----Original Message-----
From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Matrix Content, Inc.
Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2006 4:54 PM
To: Admins
Subject: [ADMINS] Notice of Copyright Infringement - Matter 205

Notice of Copyright Infringement and Demand to Immediately Terminate Unauthorized Use

To:         bikinibikini.com
Morgan Carey
1665 bob o link way
Nanaimo, British Columbia v9R 2P7
Canada
2507512447 
seoguy@seo-guy.com         
Complaining Party:         Rashaan Hayes, as agent authorized by and acting on behalf of
Virtual Holdings, Inc., the owner of the copyrights to all the works and other
material, identified herein as "Subject Material" to which this Notice pertains, and
as agent authorized by and acting on behalf of Matrix Content, Inc., the exclusive
licensor of online use of the Subject Material (hereinafter "Agent" or "Complaining
Party").         
Copyright Owner:         Virtual Holdings, Inc. (hereinafter "Copyright Owner").         
Exclusive Rights Owner:         Matrix Content, Inc. (Owner of exclusive rights to grant
limited licenses to use Subject Material via the Internet, hereinafter "Exclusive
Rights Owner").         
Infringement Locations:         1. http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread47819.html
        
Matter Number:         205         
Issuance Date:         August 8th, 2006         

I, Rashaan Hayes, an Agent authorized by the Copyright Owner and Exclusive Rights
Owner, hereby provide the following notification and demand ("Notice") pursuant to
17 U.S.C.
